lines.text: Uh excuse me, do you mind if we drop you off on the freeway, we're in kind of a hurry?
Whatever.

[Jenny presses on the gas, and the car takes off]
Woah, yeah! Ha ha, step on it!

[a Police car pulls up behind them]
Uh Oh, the long arm of the law!
You promised me Friday, it's Friday. What the heck am I supposed to do now?
I'm sorry, Mr. Lautner, it's not quite ready yet.
Not quite ready? Look at this. My car is, laid out like somebody's science project.
Well, w'we gave you that estimate before we understood the extend of the damage.
[to Jenny Todd]
Could I help you, miss?
Um, Yes. You said my car was ready.
You realize I scheduled my life, around you promise, that my car would be ready, Friday.

[to Jenny Todd]
It looks like you're all set.
[to Ed Lautner]
I'm sorry Mr. Lautner.
I appreciate that, I really do, but I've got that most important meeting of MY LIFE! This morning, and um, I'm stuck without a car.
Excuse me, sir. Who do I speak to about my car, what was done to it?
Well...
[interrupted by Ed Lautner]
Can you believe this? Do you have a loaner?
We don't provide that.
[to Jenny Todd]
What did you want to know?
Uh Well, I, I would like to know what exactly was done to it
[interrupted by Ed Lautner]
So, I have to rent a car?
I would suggest that.
[to Jenny Todd]
The retainer clip, on your vac
[pause]
, do you know anything about cars?
No, not really.
Than, it's a good thing we're here, huh?
Yes, it is.
We took, GOOD car of it. Just go see the cashier.
So where do I rent a car?
Well, there's uh, A1 Rent-A-Car, it's about six or seven miles, right of that way.
Uh huh, So
[pause]
, how do I get there?
Oh, well, Jose can take ya. Uh,
[to Mechanic, shouting]
Johnny! Where's Jose? When he say he'll be back?
I don't know!

[to himself]
Oh my God.

[Sees Ed get a cigarette]
Smoking kills, ya know? Makes ya dead.
So does skateboarding.
I mean statistically though, think of your kid.
It's not my kid.
Well, who's evers.
Actually, I would prefer if you didn't. The baby and us.
The baby, I told you.
Oh, right.
